1.content: Fix authentication form input field styling issues
1.details:
1. Add proper background colors (bg-white) to input fields for better visibility
2. Improve border colors and focus states
3. Ensure proper contrast ratios for accessibility
4. Fix text color visibility in input fields
5. Update both LoginForm and SignupForm components

2.details:
1. Create user account with email: demo@dataflow.com and password: demo123
2. Verify the account can be used to login
3. Ensure proper role assignment for demo user

3.details:
1. Enhance color palette with better contrast
2. Improve spacing and layout consistency
3. Add better visual hierarchy with typography
4. Improve button states (hover, active, disabled)
5. Add smooth animations and transitions
6. Enhance the dashboard and navigation components
7. Improve responsive design for mobile devices
8. Add better loading states and feedback

4.details:
1. Test login with demo credentials
2. Verify form styling on different screen sizes
3. Check accessibility standards
4. Deploy to production
5. Push to GitHub
